response.overview: Skiing is not art, and skiers are not artists. Unless, of course, skiing is art and skiers are artists? Faction's fourth feature film exhibits pure creativity through a series of freeski sequences-from the vibrant streets of Japan, to the powdery pillows of British Columbia, to the finely-manicured terrain parks of Switzerland and Italy. Each location provides a blank canvas for the team's artistic expression. Because nothing screams "artist" like sending large cliffs and grinding the side of buildings. In co-production with Red Bull Media House.
response.title: Abstract: A Freeski Exhibition
